CustomField.description: Is this Account ranked in the IntApp Legal 680 or the Intapp Accounting 150? If so, the status is "In Target Market." If not, the status is "Outside Target Market."
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( Intapp_Master_Ranking__c >0, Intapp_Accounting_150__c >0, Intapp_Investment_Banking_200__c>0, Intapp_Hedge_Funds_200__c>0, Intapp_Litigation_Consulting_36__c>0 ), OR ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Dissolved')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Dissolved - Prospect')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Dissolved - Suspect')) ) ), "In Target Market", "Outside Target Market")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Are we actively targeting this firm for sales?
CustomField.label: Intapp Market Status
